com.ogprover.polynomials
Class Polynomial

java.lang.Object
  com.ogprover.polynomials.Polynomial
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SymbolicPolynomial, UPolynomial, XPolynomial
public abstract class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Class description:
Abstract class for polynomials of all types

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

public final boolean isZero()
Check whether polynomial is zero constant.

getTermsAsDescList

public java.util.ArrayList<Term> getTermsAsDescList()
Method that gives all terms from polynomial in descending order.

Returns:
List of all terms in descending order. List contains references to objects from original tree of terms.

getPolynomialDegree

public int getPolynomialDegree()
Method that retrieves the greatest degree of all terms of this polynomial. It is called the polynomial degree. E.g. degree of polynomial x5 + x4^2*x2^2 + x3*x1 + 7 is equals to 4 and comes from term x4^2*x2^2.

Returns:
Polynomial degree
